column2: Is a direct vassal of the Holy Roman Empire
Is a direct vassal of the §Y[emf_global_hre.GetFullName]§!

[Root.GetBestName] dethroned the Karlings from a traditionally Karling kingdom. [Root.GetSubjectPronounCap] is seen by many as part of the future while the Karling dynasty dominating Europe is waning.
